text: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ

translation.en.sahih: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya telah datang kepada mereka beberapa kisah yang di dalamnya terdapat cegahan (dari kekafiran).
